price: Allí invocarán: "¡Glorificado seas, oh, Señor!" Y el saludo entre ellos será: "¡Paz!" Y al finalizar sus súplicas dirán: "¡Todas las alabanzas pertenecen a Dios, Señor del universo!"
arabic: دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ فِيهَا سُبۡحَٰنَكَ ٱللَّهُمَّ وَتَحِيَّتُهُمۡ فِيهَا سَلَٰمٞۚ وَءَاخِرُ دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ أَنِ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: daʿwāhum fīhā sub'ḥānaka al-lahuma wataḥiyyatuhum fīhā salāmun waākhiru daʿwāhum ani al-ḥamdu lillahi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
